li.p: Katalon TestOps CI is another way to execute or schedule Katalon Studio tests remotely. To learn more about Katalon TestOps CI, see Test Planning Overview.

conbody.p: Orbs are shareable packages of configuration elements, including jobs, commands, and executors. See CircleCI documents about Orbs: Orbs Introduction Cloud.

Katalon Orb enables you to execute Katalon tests with your CircleCI CI/CD pipeline. We recommend getting the latest version from the CircleCI Orb registry page. Download the latest Katalon Orb on CircleCI: katalon/katalon-studio.
